column5: What will they think of next?  https://www.facebook.com/video.php?v=1617668858487381
I'm just thinking the loogans will find more of a use for that, than the true Steelheader. Most of us already know where they should be holding. Technology really is amazing though!
What's the range on a bluetooth device??? if it's like my phone and hearing aids not very far, definitely no hero drifts.
Pretty cool...  I would use it to watch my rig/bait carp fishing
